sentence.Network_en: The new leader's statement does not assort with his Party's principles.

sentence.Network_en: My daughter will not assort with people of her own age.
sentence.Network_cn: 我女儿和她的同龄人不合群.

sentence.Network_cn: 这些电视机与样品不符.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from Old French assorter, from a- (from Latin ad 'to, at') + sorte 'sort, kind'

means.word_mean: 1. keep company with; hang out with;
2. arrange or order by classes or categories;
